info.title: Captain Tools API
info.description: A service for creating test cases by integrating with various tools like Jira.

get.summary: Get Jira User Account Connection Status
get.description: Checks the connection status of the Jira user account.

post.summary: Connect Jira User Account To App
post.description: Initiates the Jira OAuth 2.0 (3LO) authorization flow. Returns a redirect URL for the user to authorize the application.

get.description: Receives the authorization code from Jira, exchanges it for tokens, and stores them securely. Not meant to be called by users directly.
Fetches the list of Jira projects for a connected user.

post.description: Connects a user to an ALM project by either creating a new project entry or updating an existing one.

get.description: Gets the projects that a user is connected to and has access to.
Gets the details of a project by project id including its latest version, tool (ex. Jira, Azure DevOps), siteId(Unique project id in the ALM tool), siteDomain (Projects domain in the ALM tool), etc.

delete.description: Marks a specific requirement as deleted for a given project version.
Marks a specific test case as deleted for a given project version.

post.description: Confirm the extracted explicit requirements and starts implicit requirements creation
Confirms the requirements for a project version and triggers the test case creation workflow.
Confirms test cases and initiates requirements and testcases creation/updation in ALM tool as a background task.
Syncs specified requirement ALM creation status with the app.
Syncs specified testcase ALM creation status with the app.
Creates specified requirement in ALM tool
Creates specified test case in ALM tool
Triggers the creation of datasets for test cases by calling an external workflow.

get.description: Fetches requirements for a given project version, optionally filtered by source or regulation.
Fetches testcases for a given project version and requirement ID.

post.description: Creates a new version for a given project.
Updates the change analysis status of specified requirement.
Confirm the change analysis of explicit requirements.
